column2: PROPOSED ALTTERATION & ADDITION TO EXISTING HOUSE AT RAJAGIRIYA FOR MRS. PRADEEPA
PRICED BILL OF QUANTITIES - STAGE II

column3: Description
Demolishing
Removing existing steel framed Zn/Al sheet roof constructed at frist floor terrace
Removing existing hand rail at frist floor terrace
Removing existing floor rendering at frist floor terrace (apprx. Area 735ft2).
Cleaining site and debris clear
Dimolishing work Carried to Summary
Waterproofing Work
Applying approved Quality waterproofing material to terrace at frist floor.
Waterproofing work Carried to Summary
Concrete work
4" thick salab in G20 Concrete. Rate to include for steel Column & Beam using 4"x6" I Section and 3mm thick steel deck plate. Rate to include for reinfrocement.
Concrete work Carried to Summary
Floor and Wall finishes
20mm thick floor rendering using 1:5 cement sand mortar at terrace at frist floor and finish semi rough
20mm thick floor rendering in 1:5 cement sand mortar and smooth cement floating at terrace at frist floor  Kitchen area.
Floor and wall finishes Carried to Summary
Roof Work
Supplying fabricating and fixing of 0.47mm thick Zn/Al corogated sheet roof at 1st floor terrace area as per thd detail drawing. (apprx. Area 950 Sq.ft)
Roof Work Carried to Summary
Plumbing Work
Supplying and fixing of Single Bowl Single Drain Stainless steel Kitchen sink at frist floor kitchen area. Rate to include for bottle trap.
Supplying and fixing of Cromium Plated Swan neck tap to kitchen sink. Rate to include for angle valve, flexible horse and other necessary accessories
Allow Item Sum for supplying and laying of water supply line to kitchen sink
Allow Item Sum for supplying and laying of waste water line from kitchen sink

Allow item sum for supplying and laying of water supply line to washing machine with pib tap. Rate to include for removing existing wall tile, chasing wall and laying pipes and laying wall tile. (Note:- Tile should supply by client)
Allow Item Sum for supplying and laying of water supply line to kitchen sink
Plumbing Works Carried to Summary
Electrical Works
Point wiring for 13A plug point at frist floor kitchen area
Point wiring for 13A plug point at bath room at frist floor for operate washing machine
Electrical Works Carried to Summary
